messages.message: Are we considering more work on the “New Class” panel in Build? When I create a class name I am shown a “Result” that is not the class I just created (it’s the class of the currently selected doc). I’m not sure I understand why this selection should be here. Also it’s not obvious the new class has been auto-saved and the only way to exit is the close “X” button in the top right.
@Natasha was the one who made this design, and the design as you see it is pretty much the one on figma i think

the results section shows the classification results for the selected document (which may or may not match the class currently being edited) - displaying results in that gray section based on the selected doc is what we do for the field editor and for validations.

In this screenshot I just got confused on if I had just made the Lyft class or the Bank Statement. I haven’t used the field editor and validations too much yet, so I’ll adapt to this :slightly_smiling_face:
that's fair feedback! i'll keep track of this
